title: Shono
description:
Shono is an AI agent for Slack that initiates and facilitates fun, gamified challenges. It helps teams to share knowledge, build healthy habits, and create a more vibrant and connected workplace culture.🏆

Challenges like:
📰 Industry News Challenge
💧 Daily Hydration Challenge
🚶‍♂ Daily Step Challenge
💪 Gym Commitment Challenge
🥗 Healthy Lunch Challenge
📚 Book Club Challenge
